name: Witch Queen
description: The Witch Queen is a small humanoid embodying chaotic evil, armed with a maddening scimitar and clad in studded leather armor.
memorable: She manipulates her foes through her spells and has a clever, devious combat style.
goals: To dominate through magic and cunning, instilling fear and controlling others.
relations: May serve dark entities or be involved with other chaotic beings.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded areas, away from sunlight.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma enhance her agility and spellcasting capabilities.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Wisdom limit her physical prowess and perception.
attacks: Maddening Scimitar that can manipulate foes into attacking each other.
most_powerful_ability: Heightened Spell, allowing her to gain advantage on spellcasting.
senses: Darkvision up to 120 feet, but has low passive perception.
skills: Proficient in arcana and stealth, showcasing her magical knowledge and elusiveness.
additional_information: Has sunlight sensitivity, affecting combat in bright light.
Capable of casting a variety of spells to control and harm enemies.
Can impose disadvantage on foes to enhance her spells' effectiveness.
Resistant to magical attacks due to magic resistance.
Her spells allow for crowd control and area damage.
spellcasting: 8th-level spellcaster; spells include blight, lightning bolt, and invisibility.
test_queries: small cunning spellcaster with dark vision
chaotic evil magic user with sunlight weakness
manipulative witch queen using spells and deception
